AddressEmptyCode(address).details: There's no code at `target` (it is not a contract).

AddressInsufficientBalance(address).details: The ETH balance of the account is not enough to perform the operation.

FailedInnerCall().details: A call to an address target failed. The target may have reverted.

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC20 token failed.

params.user: The user to check authorization for

returns._0: True if msg.sender can act on behalf of user

params.assets: The amount of assets that was flash loaned.
params.data: Arbitrary data passed to the `flashLoan` function.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setDelegate(address,bool).details: Manager must be approved by owner first

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

approvedManagers(address).notice: Approved managers that can act on behalf of users who delegate to them

authorizationHelper().notice: Address of the KapanAuthorizationHelper contract for auth encoding

authorizeInstructions((string,bytes)[],a.notice: Generate authorization calls for instructions (delegates to helper)

deauthorizeInstructions((string,bytes)[].notice: Generate deauthorization calls for instructions (delegates to helper)

isAuthorizedFor(address).notice: Check if caller is authorized to act for a user

onMorphoFlashLoan(uint256,bytes).notice: Callback called when a flash loan occurs.

recoverNative(address,uint256).notice: Recover native ETH stuck in the router (owner only)

recoverTokens(address,address,uint256).notice: Recover ERC20 tokens stuck in the router (owner only)

setAavePool(address).notice: Set the Aave V3 pool address.

setApprovedManager(address,bool).notice: Owner approves/revokes a manager address that users can delegate to

setAuthorizationHelper(address).notice: Set the authorization helper contract address

setDelegate(address,bool).notice: User grants/revokes delegation to a manager

setMorphoBluePool(address).notice: Set the Morpho Blue address for flash loans.
